meanings.definition: The act of covering or enclosing something in paper or other material.
meanings.sent1: I love the colorful wrapping on birthday presents.
meanings.sent2: She carefully removed the wrapping to reveal the gift inside.
meanings.sent3: The wrapping on the present was so shiny, it almost looked like a mirror.
meanings.sent4: His smile was like the wrapping on a present, hiding a surprise underneath.
meanings.sent5: The wrapping on the package crinkled as she tore it open, revealing the contents.

meanings.definition: A piece of paper or other material used to cover or enclose something.
meanings.sent1: The wrapping around the bouquet of flowers was delicate and beautiful.
meanings.sent2: He carefully folded the wrapping around the fragile item to protect it.
meanings.sent3: The wrapping on the gift was so fancy, it looked like a work of art.
meanings.sent4: Her words were like the wrapping on a present, concealing a hidden meaning.
meanings.sent5: The wrapping on the box was torn, but it still held the item securely inside.

meanings.definition: The process of winding or folding something around an object.
meanings.sent1: The wrapping of the ribbon around the gift added a special touch.
meanings.sent2: She learned the art of wrapping the fabric around the gift with precision.
meanings.sent3: His wrapping of the scarf around his neck was so haphazard, it looked like a tangled mess.
meanings.sent4: The wrapping of the vines around the tree created a beautiful natural pattern.
meanings.sent5: The wrapping of the bandage around the wound was done carefully to ensure proper healing.

meanings.definition: The outer layer or covering of something.
meanings.sent1: The shiny wrapping of the candy made it look even more tempting.
meanings.sent2: She peeled off the wrapping to reveal the chocolate bar inside.
meanings.sent3: The wrapping of clouds around the mountain made it look like a painting.
meanings.sent4: The wrapping of snow around the trees created a winter wonderland.
meanings.sent5: The wrapping of leaves around the flower bud protected it from the cold.
